{"step_by_step_thinking": "The masseter muscle is located in the cheek area, near the lower jaw. The artery that runs along the anterior border of the masseter is the facial artery. The superficial temporal artery is located more superiorly, near the temples. The lingual artery supplies the tongue and the floor of the mouth, and the maxillary artery is deep and not palpable.", "answer_choice": "B. Facial artery"}
